lego.target: I'm not going to be able to...

practice_phrases.target: I'm not going to be able to speak.
I'm not going to be able to learn.
I'm not going to be able to remember.
I'm not going to be able to finish.
I'm not going to be able to come back today.

practice_phrases.known: 我不会轻易记住这个的。
practice_phrases.target: I'm not going to be able to remember this easily.

practice_phrases.known: 我不会和你一起练习的。
practice_phrases.target: I'm not going to be able to practise with you.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我在学习，所以我不会停下来的。
practice_phrases.target: Because I'm learning, I'm not going to be able to stop.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我不会记住怎么说的。
practice_phrases.target: I guess I'm not going to be able to remember how to say it.

practice_phrases.known: 我不会轻易记住用英语怎么说的。
practice_phrases.target: I'm not going to be able to remember how to say it in English easily.
